# Swap

| Characteristic | Value    |
| -------------- | -------- |
| Type           | `object` |

## Properties

### `deviceId` **<span style="color:orange;">(required)</span>**

The ID of the block device to use for this swap area.

| Characteristic | Value             |
| -------------- | ----------------- |
| Type           | `string`          |
| Format         | `Block Device ID` |
